name: Monster Companion
description:
This is my first time participating in Ludum Dare. It's been fun but quite a challenge as well. I used Unity and had to use a few assets from the Asset Store that I had already purchased in the past. Pretty much everything has been used from others except for the main game logic. I have learned a lot from this and am hoping next LD I will be able to use everything created by me :)

Hope you enjoy the concept of the game at least. Cheers.
